title: Proximity Sensor, Android 11 Pixel 3xl Issue
content:
Hi, event hough I have installed the latest update (this weekend), my proximity sensor on my Pixel 3xl is just dead.
It's only since I have android 11 and trust me my phone becomes unusable. 
It can't be that Google has no solution after two months? Any chance you can help? This could be a reason some customers leave Android as they can't afford such problems without solutions for so long.
